attributes.action: Deport Choudhary, other terrorists and stop funding terrorism by paying them benefits
attributes.additional_details:
By giving Anjum Choudhary British benefits above the national average wage, the government may well be inadvertently funding terrorism. We demand that this benefit is stopped immediately for Choudhary and all other terrorists/preachers of hate.

Ignore ALL Eu directives regarding deportation and get him out of Great Britain immediately. He does not like the British, the British way of life but loves our Asylum and benefit rules.
